Baixing.com ¬∑ Full-time

Shanghai, China ¬∑ On-site

Responsibilities

‚óè Based on PHP and Elasticsearch, developed including core business logic, RESTful API, etc.
‚óè Continuous updates and refactorings of the Core Classified Advertisements Query Service.
‚óè Part of the front-end work developed and maintained a re-usable UI Components library.

Associated with Baixing.com

‚Ä¢ Led refactoring of the core classified advertisements website, tackling legacy code challenges.
‚Ä¢ Managed project lifecycle: conducted initial research, decoded old code, liaised with product managers and data analysts, and designed architecture.
‚Ä¢ Successfully implemented ABTest and traffic management strategies, developed a monitoring dashboard, and enhanced documentation.

Achievements

‚Ä¢ Applied design patterns to extend code longevity, preventing degradation for five years.
Boosted code comprehension and development efficiency by over 50%.
‚Ä¢ Delivered three company-wide technical presentations, contributing to knowledge sharing.
‚Ä¢ Awarded the company's Best Efficiency Award, earning widespread recognition.

Present
Florida

Responsibilities

‚óè Designed and implemented Distributed End-to-End Encryption RTM System.
‚óè Deployed and offered consultation of Istio architecture and set up the rules for microservices for more efficient development. ‚óè Created and maintained a complete CI/CD pipeline, and accomplished the DevOps responsibilities.

Associated with Qutoutiao Ë∂£Â§¥Êù° (NASDAQ: QTT)

‚Ä¢ Redesigned and migrated the Real-Time Messaging (RTM) infrastructure to Kubernetes, enhancing scalability and system availability.
‚Ä¢ Supporting over 600,000 concurrent users.
‚Ä¢ Orchestrated nine microservices providing Chat Room, Bullet Chat, Customer Support Live Chat functionalities across various business units.
‚Ä¢ Implemented a message sequence model and ACK mechanism, achieving a message delivery rate of over 98%.
‚Ä¢ Established gateway discovery and registration for stable message delivery during Autoscaling.
‚Ä¢ Crafted comprehensive monitoring dashboards with Prometheus and Grafana, tracking message rates, user load, and API performance.
‚Ä¢ Collaborated in developing CI/CD processes and environment isolation strategies with DevOps team.

Qutoutiao Ë∂£Â§¥Êù° (NASDAQ: QTT) ¬∑ Full-time
Oct 2019 - Sep 2020 ¬∑ 1 yr
Shanghai, China ¬∑ On-site

Responsibilities

‚óè Based on Kubernetes, designed and developed high concurrency back-end application services.
‚óè Cooperated with DevOps engineers on SOA governance.
‚óè Established microservice standards, including Metrics, Trace, Log, and the team's coding specification.
‚óè Refactored, divided, and decoupled antiquated services.
‚óè Designed and developed a real-time messaging system based on Kubernetes.

Ning Liu

  • üë¶ My name is Ning Liu. I was born in China and recently moved to the United States.
  • üí° I am familiar with popular technology stacks such as Docker, Kubernetes, Istio, and Service

Mesh. Also, I am a Golang and PHP programmer. Although I have seniority experience in backend development, I graduated with a major in Advertising Design 12 years ago.

  • üë®‚Äçüéì To be a profound experience with ten years of full-time web development and architecture design, I am committed to taking responsibility for my project to produce efficient, stable, and graceful back-end service.
  • ‚ö° I enjoy promoting and organizing teams to share technology to build a technical-sharing atmosphere. I am often active in presentations at the company's back-end and front-end conferences.
